entity.name: term
entity.query: SELECT id, concat('term') AS domain, acc, name, term_type, is_obsolete FROM term

entity.name: term_synonym
entity.query: SELECT term_synonym, acc_synonym FROM term_synonym WHERE term_id='${term.id}'

entity.name: term_definition
entity.query: SELECT term_definition, term_comment FROM term_definition WHERE term_id='${term.id}'

entity.name: gene_product
entity.query: SELECT gene_product.id, concat('gene_product') AS domain, symbol, full_name as name, ncbi_taxa_id, term.name AS type_name, term.acc AS type_acc, concat(dbxref.xref_dbname, ':', dbxref.xref_key) AS acc FROM gene_product, species, term, dbxref WHERE species_id=species.id AND type_id=term.id AND dbxref_id=dbxref.id

entity.name: gene_product_synonym
entity.query: SELECT product_synonym FROM gene_product_synonym WHERE gene_product_id='${gene_product.id}'

entity.name: associated_term
entity.query: SELECT term.acc AS associated_term FROM gene_product, association, term WHERE gene_product.id = association.gene_product_id AND association.term_id = term.id AND gene_product_id='${gene_product.id}'
